Content: People claim these bikes are ugly, slow, heavy, and undesirable, and although it may not be ridiculously fast, I love the tank. Shes got great roll on, comfy as all get out, surprisingly feels light as a feather, and sounds incredible to boot! What they say about the katanas being cold blooded is definitely true, as though she starts with no issues, it takes a good 5-10 minutes for her to idle properly.

Title: Bought a katana, surprisingly satsfied
Author: IloveSlowBikes
